lines: The history we were taught growing up was all a lie, the priest and mentor I had come to respect the most was a fraud, Lebrassoir was never loyal to the Dzemaels, and now Archombadin and Theomocent are practically joined at the hip... It's as if the world's gone mad!

But perhaps a little madness was just what I needed, for all these changes have made me realize how narrow-minded and set in my own ways I was. From now on I shall endeavor to be more accommodating and accepting of others' ideas and opinions.
